title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You hope to quiet a storm of dissatisfaction with a healthy dose of delightful self-indulgence today. Perhaps you believe theres never too much of a good thing. But excess is real and you very much run the risk of overdoing your quest for bliss now. However, theres a chance that what lurks beneath the surface is more your pain than your pleasure. Check your motives to determine if your behavior is part of a coverup or a celebration. Philosopher Epicurus, of epicurean fame, wrote, Be moderate in order to taste the joys of life in abundance. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
